snippet.title: The Valley of the Architects | Trailer 1 (STEAM & iOS)
snippet.description:
Trailer 1 for a puzzle game, narratively grounded around architecture, adventure and elevators. From WHALEO.

Follow architectural writer Liz on a journey through Africa to uncover the secrets of a lost and forgotten Architect. Using your problem solving skills, overcome each puzzle and slowly unwrap the story of a lifetime.

COMING TO iOS AND STEAM

WISHLIST ON STEAM NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2759140/The_Valley_of_the_Architects/
